The '''Goblet of Eonothem''', also known colloquially as "'''the cup'''" or "'''the goblet'''," is an [[Artifact]] Piece in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. It increases a [[character]]'s attributes and currently has 12 possible main affixes: HP%, DEF%, ATK%, [[Elemental Mastery]], or {{Color|[[Physical]]}}/{{Hydro}}/{{Pyro}}/{{Cryo}}/{{Dendro}}/{{Electro}}/{{Anemo}}/{{Geo}} [[DMG Bonus]]%. Artifact Pieces can appear in all qualities (1–5{{star}}).
